mapper.select: select product_id, product_name, product_category, product_price, product_desc, percentage_discount, available_quantity, post_date, thumbnail, main_img, sub1_img, sub2_img, sub3_img, thumbnailhover from products
mapper.insert: insert into products (product_id, product_name, product_category, product_price, product_desc, percentage_discount, available_quantity, post_date, thumbnail, main_img, sub1_img, sub2_img, sub3_img, thumbnailhover) values (#{product_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_category}, #{product_price}, #{product_desc}, #{percentage_discount}, #{available_quantity}, #{post_date}, #{thumbnail}, #{main_img}, #{sub1_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sub2_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sub3_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnailhover})
